item.title: ECB’s Elderson Warns of Inflation Risks From Nature Degredation
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The European Central Bank must account for risks stemming from damage to nature, a process that could feed inflation in the same way that climate change does, according to Executive Board member Frank Elderson. “If nature degradation continues, economic activities dependent on ecosyst...

item.title: Panetta Says ECB Must Move to Neutral Rates to Aid Growth
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The European Central Bank should cut interest rates far enough to ensure they are no longer constraining economic growth, Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said. “Restrictive monetary conditions are no longer necessary,” Panetta, the Bank of Italy governor, said on Tuesday in Mil...
